title: Pixel Battle Royale

content.developer: Pixel Battle Royale is created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› ActionPixel Battle RoyaleBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPixel Battle Royale is an amazing 3D shooting game where you join the intense battles against the opponents.First you will have to press F key so that you will be parachuting from the plane. You will need weapons and ammo, so search for them in the buildings and start hunting and shooting the opponents.Be careful they are pretty fast but with good strategy you will put them down.Select the level: • Battle Royale • Sandbox Choose your character: • Soldier• Farmer• Medic• Salaryman• Police• MedicPixel Battle Royale Display: • Health (displayed on the bottom center)• Number of Pixels alive (displayed on the top right)• Map (displayed on the bottom right)Pixel Battle Royale Controls:WASD or arrow keys to moveLeft mouse button to shootRight mouse button to aimF to interact or pick a weapon or parachutingSpace bar to jumpLeft shift to runR to reloadC to crouchTab to open inventory1, 2, 3, 4 to change weaponV to change cameraDeveloperPixel Battle Royale is created by FreezeNova.This article was updated on January 24, 20243DActionBattleBattle RoyaleBlockCrazyFirst Person ShooterFreeGunMinecraftPixelSandboxShootingSurvivalUnityWeapon
